member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.JsonNet.Serialization.DataItemJsonConverter.CanConvert(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance can convert the specified object type.
member.returns: true if this instance can convert the specified object type; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.JsonNet.Serialization.DataItemJsonConverter.ReadJson(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,System.Type,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Reads the JSON representation of the object.
member.param: The existing value of object being read.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.JsonNet.Serialization.DataItemJsonConverter.WriteJson(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonWriter,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Writes the JSON representation of the object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.JsonNet.StrongReference
member.summary: Attributes are not treated as a reference, thus all dependants that are using JsonConverter in the attribute should call to this explicitly for the dll to be bin-placed.

member.name: T:AssemblyRef
member.summary: Sets public key string for friend assemblies.

member.name: F:AssemblyRef.ProductPublicKey
member.summary: ProductPublicKey is an official MS supported public key for external releases. TestPublicKey is an unsupported strong key for testing and internal use only
